page.title: 15Halls in Horsmonden
page.content: There are three halls in Horsmonden which are all used for fund-raising activities & as meeting-places for village organisations. The Village Hall in Back Lane consists of a hall with a stage & kitchen, & is used by the Horsmonden Players for shows & can be hired privately for wedding Receptions & discos. Parish Council Meetings are held here. St. Margaret's Hall in the Goudhurst Road was built in 1970 & incorporates the Rectory. The Sunday School meets here &, as the church is far from the village, some Services are held too. The third hall is attached to the Methodist Church in Furnace Lane & is used for Junior Church, Youth Club, Church functions & the Area Health Authority Child Health Clinic. The Gardening Society & Paddock Wood Table Tennis Club also meet here.
